title: Disney+ begins taking pre-orders
text:
New York (CNN Business) Disney+ doesn't launch for another two months, but it's now available for pre-order.

But the $12.99-per-month bundle that includes Hulu and ESPN+ won't be available for purchase until the November launch date, the website said.

The service launched in beta earlier this month in the Netherlands. Disney+ will be available in Canada on the same date as the United States and will launch a week later in the Australia and New Zealand.

Netflix NFLX Disney DIS The eagerly anticipated streaming service is loaded with familiar content in an attempt to take on. It will be the exclusive home for Marvel, "Star Wars,"Animation and Pixar content. Original content, like a "High School Musical" series, will also be produced for it.

Read More
description: Disney+ doesn't launch for another two months, but it's now available for pre-order.
